dt-option.name: searchPanes.show
dt-option.summary: Force Panes to hide or show

type.description:
By setting the `-init columns.searchPanes.show` option to true for a column, a pane for that column will be shown even if the default calculations would not normally have created one for that column.
Equally, by setting the `init columns.searchPanes.show` option to be false for a column, a pane for that column will not be shown even if the default calculations would normally have created one for that column.
